item.title: On writing
item.description: Writing used to be much easier! It used to be thought occurs â†’ thought gets on paper It used to be fun and exciting, reflective, creative, romantic. It was simply an act of self expression: A poem about the lake that’s dried up, just because, lucky luke fan fiction in which he finally shoots the Doltons and puts an end to their frustrating cycle of escape and recapture, or quite simply an “I like you” to someone you just made friends with on the playground.

item.title: Ur cute tho...
item.description: We have a cute visitor! Oh no! this one doesn’t know yet :( You may not realize it, but you’re cute af! please stay with us to make this an even cuter place to hang out :)

item.title: Your feelings are valid!
item.description: We have a cute visitor! Your feelings have been successfully validated! Help us become even cuter by staying with us for a while :)
